questions.question: What is the title of the article that discusses the crystal structure of a compound involving sodium?
questions.answer: The Crystal Structure of Sodium Oxalate

questions.question: Who are the authors of the study on the crystal structure of sodium oxalate published in the Journal of the American Chemical Society?
questions.answer: G. A. Jeffrey and G. S. Parry
